title: (33909) Langreo - 3 Paseo Llerones
description:
Parking next to schools and institutes, so at night it is very quiet. The road only leads to schools so there are no cars. At night it is common for the police to patrol. Right next to it there is a descent to the river, where there is a fountain, picnic tables and wastebaskets. There are two pedestrian bridges that lead to the urban center (200 meters) where there are bars, shops, pharmacies...
BEWARE: In that area, circulation is not allowed (if parking) on school days at the time of entry and exit of school, so if you want to arrive or leave at the end of classes you have to wait for the children to leave .

title: (33610) - 14 Caserio Fortuna
description:
Car park at the Fortuna Well Interpretation Center (the center is only open on Easter and from June to September).
Level but short squares (no more than 5 m). Quiet place next to the road. There are no signs prohibiting overnight stays or parking with a motorhome.
There is an area with tables and the Turón Valley path that runs through different mine buildings and machinery used in the mines.
Next to it is a monument. It is a large monolith, erected in honor of the 400 people murdered by Francoism and buried in the common grave in the well that is below the monument.

title: (33618) Mieres del Camino - A-66

description: Picnic area with many tables, grass area and barbecues that as of 8/20/20 do not have grills. There is a lot of shade and lots of unregulated parking. A straight-through water source that may not be treated. Good area to spend a couple of days and even spend the night. Good views of the mountains and very quiet. It can be difficult to get there with motorhomes, vans without problems.

Although it is next to the train track, it does not pass at night. Tuesday is market day and it is more crowded. Nearby is the train station and the bus station that take about twenty minutes to the cities of Oviedo and Gijón. Shops of all kinds, cafeteria and restaurants. Next to the train station a hiking and bicycle route begins.

description: Good picnic site if you catch a route, with a playground for children. It has a good parking lot if you want to sleep.

description: It is a Recreation Area at the entrance of the Town, we asked the neighbors and they told us that there was no problem sleeping there as long as we did not park inside the Area (it is delimited). We spent two amazing nights in the shade and practically alone. The neighbors told us routes to do, places to see and drinking water sources in the surroundings, without a doubt a fantastic place to disconnect :)

name: El trasgu la Fronda
title: (33989) El trasgu la Fronda
description: Zone at the foot of the road to park while visiting the Farm of El trasgu la frond, place of several activities for the kids. If you go with a Van you can enter through the entrance of the farm, turning to enter down, the turn is complicated even with a car. the cars or large volume I do not see clearly that they can make the entrance. We the owners accompanied us to the designated field and we went down on foot, we were going with 7.40mts.

title: (33987) Puente de Arco - 34 LV-5
description: Although in the council of Laviana there is already a motorhome area with emptying of black and gray water and some places to spend the night, I recommend this one more than I propose, for various reasons, the first because of the situation in which it is located, just next to one of the symbols of the Laviana council, Puente de Arcu, a Roman-style bridge, although it dates from the 12th century. In addition to this, if you go through this area in summer, you can enjoy a good swim in the waters of the Nalón river, since just below the parking lot the river has a pool that the local people use as a bathing area. Another point in its favor is its tranquility, since the area of Laviana that I mentioned before, is located right next to the railway line with what it implies. Finally, it should be noted that right next to you you have access to numerous routes on foot or by mountain bike, as well as being at the gates of the beautiful and unknown Redes Natural Park.

title: (33518) Collado - Siero - 6027A Lugar Castro
description: Quiet place to dine and spend the night, great views, no noise. Respect the facilities. Garbage container in the adjoining parking lot for 5 or 6 vans or 2 motorhomes.

title: (33580) Sorrobín - Unnamed Road
description: Very quiet place to spend the night, there is a tap with drinking water, tables and trash cans.

title: (33199) Paredes - 101A Lugar Paredes
description:
Big parking spot between nature and a big mall. Close to Ikea, Bricomart, Burger King & more. 
Despite it's position close to these big buildings, there is only little traffic on the street that leads up to the parking spot.
It's rather empty and devoid of passengers, maybe it serves as a parking spot for employees.
The noises from the big streets are everpresent, yet in a muted way.
The spot is surrounded by a firm on one side and nature, grass, cows on all other 3 sides.
Perfect if you want to visit the surrounding shops AND relax a little while.

title: (33640) Mieres - 13 Calle Doctor Rodríguez Vigil
description: Parking, without services, central hotel and trade all on foot and one step away, Romanesque church, bike rides and on foot in many directions, dirt tracks or along the river in the direction of Mieres or yesterday's Council, nearby river for fishing enthusiasts, concessions via train, Gijón, Oviedo both by train and by bus. in total a very central car park with all the services very central and a 6 km motorhome area in Mieres for loading and unloading, and a very quiet place

Cows, horses and views and peace.
 Steep driveway with no real off-road challenge.  Up there, you can drive but through the mountains.

title: (33009) Oviedo - 22 Calle Arzobispo Guisasola

title: (33008) Oviedo - 203 Calle Gil Blas
description: Free parking next to the pools, quiet and level site, with large green areas. 20 minutes walk from the cathedral.

title: (33009) Oviedo - Calle Arzobispo Guisasola
description: Paid parking on the street for max 2h. Except on Saturday afternoons and Sundays when it’s free with no time limit. The closest parking to the old town. No height limit and good length. We managed to park our L3H3 van by going a little on the sidewalk. A bit noisy on a Saturday night

title: (33011) Oviedo - 258 Calle Daniel Moyano
description:
Parking area with 16 slots for the different lengths of motorhome with two areas for services. Maximum time of 72 hours.
Close to bus lines to visit the city. Take the number 2 bus to the city and the number 1 to come back. The old town and cathedral area are worth a look but it's a 45/50 minute walk and little of interest to see along the way. Supermarket 200 metres.

title: (33011) Oviedo - 26 Calle Daniel Moyano
description: Self-service laundromat 50 m from the car park. 3 dryers. Washing machines.

description: Laundry room with dryer.

title: (33011) Oviedo - 56 Avenida del Mar

description: Newly created area. Near the gas station, the sports center and next to the city.

Facing the night, it is a good place, with the first squares a little inclined and the second ones better leveled ... Good access for vans and AC, although the parking for AC is a bit small ... title: (33005) Oviedo - 1 Calle Aniceto Sela

title: (33011) Oviedo - 43 Avenida de Pando

title: (33170) Oviedo - calle laviana
description: Small quiet area where you can park, near the Tuero Bertrand park, being a purely residential area there is hardly any traffic or influx of people, only some residents who go out to the park for a walk, it is an area to disconnect, we have parked in the area and no problem. Dogs are allowed in the park.

You can explore the surroundings both on foot and by bicycle, a visit to the church of Santiago (of pre-Romanesque origin) is recommended.

title: (33686) Soto - 1 Aldea Miravalles
description: Church with recreational area next to a river. The villagers have indicated this place to us, they have been very kind. Follow the indications to miravalles.

description: Free area. Bus station nearby near the RENFE station. Take bus N 2 to visit Oviedo. Black and grey water station!

title: (33006) Oviedo - 8 Plaza Teodoro López Cuesta

There is no fountain or water point. If there are bins. 4G coverage.

title: (33194) Oviedo - Avenida de los Monumentos

title: (33160) La Ara - 21D Calle la Mina

title: (33194) Oviedo - 6D Avenida de los Monumentos
description: Parking to visit the pre-Romanesque monuments of Santa María del Naranco

title: (33194) Oviedo - 6 Lugar el Pevidal
description: About Oviedo at the Christ the Redeemer Statue. Aussblick in the mountains and on the Atlantic Ocean. Fantastic location. No service.

title: (33686) Levinco - AS-253

title: (33639) Culquera de Arriba - AS-231

title: (33690) - Autovía Ruta de la Plata

title: (33193) Oviedo - 1T Lugar Piedramuelle
description: Parking in sports facilities. There is a bar in the parking lot. There are no signs prohibiting overnight and there is parking space for buses. There is another parking lot above.

There is a free drinking water point at the Repsol gas station.

title: (33993) - 101 AS-117

title: (33686) Pelugano - 6 Lugar Pelugano

Starting point for several mountain and climbing routes.

title: (33676) - 1 AE-3

title: (33685) Bello - Mirador de Coto Bello, Unnamed Road
title_short: (33685) Bello - Mirador de Coto Bello, Unnamed Road

address.street: Mirador de Coto Bello, Unnamed Road

title: (33422) - 145 Lugar Castiello

title: (33194) Ules - 12 Lugar Ules
description:
Ules recreational area. There are picnic tables, a drinking fountain and garbage cans.
Just 4 flat parking spaces and not too big, and next to the street, but the place is very calm and has very little passage of cars and people at night.

title: (33676) - AE-3
description: Free public parking. It's the beginning of a hiking route to visit a very beautiful waterfall in Spain.

title: (33172) Soto de Ribera - MO-5

title: () - Unnamed Road

description: Ample parking at the entrance of the town. Battery seats of about 6 meters. There is a bar-shop with a nice terrace nearby. The bad thing is some huts with hunting dogs that bark and howl quite early in the morning.

title: (33690) Lugo de Llanera - 13 Calle S
description: Very good place to bivouac. Very quiet. With playground for children and adults. Next to the station to go to Oviedo. 5 minutes from the Lugones area for services

title: (33630) Pola de Lena - 6 Calle Luis Menéndez Pidal
title_short: (33630) Pola de Lena - 6 Calle Luis Menéndez Pidal
description: Complete laundry, 2 of 10kg, 2 of 20kg, 2 dryers of 20kg. 5 euros for washing 10 kg 9 euros for washing 20 kg 3 euros for dryer

title: (33993) - 14 SC-2
description: Leisure area, benches, grills, playground and river to cool off, great views.

title: (33160) Grandiella - 12 RI-2
description: Viapara area. Area with tables and barbecues. At the start of the hardest part of the ascent to the Angliru you will see the cyclists pale before what awaits them. It is not easy to park flat, 200 m before there is an esplanade.

title: (33391) Gijón - 9 Barrio S Pelayo
description:
Place with beautiful view (Gion and surroundings area).
Next to the small road almost without traffic (during night 0 cars).
Sometimes you can see cyclists or people walking with dog, but everyone says HOLA to you.

title: (33630) -
description: Motorhome service area with all services. Next to the town and the A66 motorway. 4G coverage and DTT. It has emptying for Nautical WC. I still pass several restaurants and shops of all kinds. Near the municipal swimming pool and dog park. The local police pass several times a day to write down license plates and enforce the maximum period of stay of 48 hours.

title: (33174) Las Caldas - 60 Lugar las Caldas
description: Public parking behind the spa

title: (33312) Villaviciosa - 3 Caserio Santi
description: Field along a small road, next to a wash house with drinking water, on the way to Saint Jacques. Room for one or two van, narrow access road. No passage during the night.

title: (33993) Rioseco - 87 Lugar Soto
description: Agues Soto. Parking next to the Alba road. Quiet in a beautiful village in the Redes Natural Park.

title: (33630) Pola de Lena - A-66
description: Park with a table to eat. Benches and drinking fountain. Overnight stays are allowed but it is 10 meters from the A-66. 200 meters away is the municipal swimming pool that opens in summer. Next to the dog park.

title: (33630) Pola de Lena -
description: Parking area of the sports center, with all kinds of containers, possibility of entering the municipal swimming pool, with a spectacular bicycle cleaning area. good point to start the climb to the Gamoniteiru!

title: (33140) Oviedo - 2 Lugar las Caldas
description: Parking next to the municipal swimming pool of Las Caldas, the access is quite steep, be careful with the motorhomes, it is right next to the Fuso greenway, about 10 km of asphalt road in a beautiful environment, which takes you to the park winter of Oviedo. No services.

title: (33680) - AS-253
description: Small car park in an old bend, good for a lunch break, especially since there is nothing like it from the Puerto de San Isidro pass down the mountain

title: (33993) - 206 Rioseco
description: Quiet parking right in front of the geriatric residence. The road is on the side so it can be a bit noisy but it is very good to stop in Rioseco during the day since, despite not being very large places, there are usually very few cars and plenty of space. It is not a specific site for motorhomes but there is hardly any slope.

title: (33312) Villaviciosa - Unnamed Road
description: Parking at a time of the most beautiful and little known Asturian pre-Romanesque in Asturias. Bar in front with a very pleasant duel that tells you the history of the complex, good routes in the surroundings for cycling and walking. quiet place, without any problem to spend the night. 100% recommended.

title: (33424) Posada - 21 Avenida Prudencio González
description: Eco Laundry "EcoLaundry" There is a 20kg washing machine, two 10kg washers and two 20kg dryers.

title: (33350) La Camocha - 791 Carretera Lavandera Vega
description: Clean and modern self-service laundry. Parking opposite at 8:00. Cafes next door.

name: Área recreativa Santofirme
title: (33690) Área recreativa Santofirme
description: Santo Firme Recreation Area. area with tables and benches, fountain and great views. The road is narrow but not crowded.

title: (33529) - CB-7
description: Fuente de agua potable natural de montaña

title: (33350) Gijón - Camino de Santa Olaya
description: Very large esplanade where you can spend the night or spend the day without any problem next to the observatory. Perfect for routes. There are tables and fountain with drinking water.

title: (33637) - 55 Calle el Palacio
description: Official parking for visits to the pre-Romanesque church of Santa Cristina de Lena, slightly inclined plane, in a small valley along the stream (noise of the stream!), on a side street to the mountain village Palacio (day relative / - a lot of local traffic, dog barking, sheep bleating), mountain forest scenery.

title: (33993) Ladines - SC-2
description: Parking at the entrance of the village

title: (33680) Collanzo - 47 Carretera General
description: In the center of Collanzo. An esplanade of land next to the church. It is not very level. At night it is quiet. Access is good for any vehicle.

title: (33161) Vega de Bobies - Unnamed Road
description: Small car park in Vega de Bobies with breathtaking views of the central region of Asturias and the Sierra del Aramo. The last 5 kilometers of the climb are very similar to a very narrow asphalt track. The climb is only recommended for motorhomes less than 6 meters. But, at the end of the road, the reward is the view and the tranquility we breathe

title: (33194) Ajuyán - LL-6
description: Recreational area to make the route to the covarones, caves in a small nearby river, very quiet area, ample and flat parking.

title: (33391) Santurio -
description:
Large Picnic area with views down to Gijon and around. A very busy place at the weekend but nobody at night so sleeping is peaceful. This place is not recomended for anything larger than a small van as the road up is really steep and narrow, we just about made it in our two tonne van, but in first gear! For 4x4 and cars no problem.
Even though there are bins, there is still tissue on the floor as there is no toilet here, but it's not that bad, we've seen worse!

title: (33310) Fresnéu - v
description: Public parking in the middle of nature. level squares.

title: (33392) Gijón - 3A Polígono Porceyo Urbanización Sec14
description: Free parking with 24 hour security

title: (33391) - 130 Camín del Carbayu
description: A great place to do a paradox and eat luxury in the Carbayu, spectacular portions and quality, then a good woodland with plenty of shade to rest from the feast

title: (33392) Gijón - Nave 9B Calle Blas Cabrera y Felipe
title_short: (33392) Gijón - Nave 9B Calle Blas Cabrera y Felipe

address.street: Nave 9B Calle Blas Cabrera y Felipe

title: (33638) Asturias - AS-230
description: Beautiful fairly flat esplanade overlooking the Valle de la Peral. Perfect 4G and DTT coverage

title: (33638) Asturias - Camino As Pr-83
description: Valle del Peral Recreational Area. Quiet area for the night and with barbecues. From May to October it has an open bar with services.

title: (33117) - Unnamed Road
description: Clearing in flat grass in a bend, in the middle of the mountain, road in cul de sac until the antenna thus very little passing. Paragliding flight area.

title: (33390) Gijón - 946 Avenida Roces
description: Laundry go! Laundry

title: (33211) Gijón - 1216 Avenida de Oviedo
description: Laundrette within the Alcampo shopping center; 5 washing machines, 4 dryers, money changers (notes - coins)

title: (33310) Viñón - 29 Lugar Arboleya
description: Carmen de Arboleya Sanctuary. Play area to stop and rest. Not a sound, just the cow bells. I don't think there is a problem sleeping.

title: (33119) Oviedo - 3 Caserio la Barquera
description: Small siding next to the road where you can eat in the shade and with a fountain

title: (33211) Gijón - 42A Camin de las Casas
description: Quiet parking, next to some houses. About 5 parking spots, there are always a few vans parked.

title: (33117) Asturias - 130A Lugar Murias
description: Through a narrow asphalt road, almost flat grassland on a ridge with beautiful east / west views. Very quiet, road not at all busy. 50m higher there are other locations, and surely further still just on the radar at the very top. On the passage of a GR.

title: (33211) Gijón - 29 Avenida Salvador Allende
description: Self-service Laundry It is an area with easy parking. It has wifi to make the wait more enjoyable and a park in front for the children

title: (33119) Trubia -
description: Self-service laundry. Open daily from 9am to 10pm. 2 machines of 12 kg each for 6€. 1 machine at 19 kg for 9€. 2 large dryers for 4€ each for 12 minutes. Opening hours: 08:00 - 22:00.

title: (33470) - 26 LL-9
description: Car park next to a community centre and park. good amount of spaces and when we were there only people parked. can spend the night no problem

title: (33470) Monteagudo - LL-2
description: Recreational area of monteagudo. Equipped with tables and containers. Very good views of the surroundings.

title: (33313) Tresvilla -
description: Very quiet recreational area at the top of the hill with many tables and barbecues. Space at the beginning to park with a slight incline, but later, space for two motorhomes on the flat, already on the ground. Very acceptable road access.

title: (33115) - AS-228
description: Parking to walk the path of the Bear. Mtb center of excellence. They have a website where you can get the tracks of the routes. Very cool and cañeras

title: (33211) Gijón - 468 Camino del Mortero
description: Good spot to sleep one night, lots of space. There is much more site than it says in the description. There is the main parking lot, another behind it and further on a huge open space, like half a football field (to enter you have to go through a narrow space). The only bad thing is: there is a soccer field with lights, a nearby road can be heard and there are no services.

name: Finca Zihuatanejo
title: (33191) Finca Zihuatanejo
description: Beautiful Zihuatanejo Garden with huge trees and grass meadow. Only Cars Vans or small motorhome maximum 6 meters. It is flat and horizontal well leveled. Large wooden picnic table Perfect for a day out or getaway. Near the viewpoint of the Meandros del Nora. And spectacular area on the outskirts of Oviedo. 10 minutes from Oviedo and 40 from Gijon. Private Estate of a Campervan. If you leave it as you find it, I'll let you spend the night on my farm. Let me know by Whatsapp and I'll tell you how to pass.

name: Camping Deva Gijon
title: (33394) Camping Deva Gijon
description: Gijón, 78 Camin of the Pasadiella. Camping "Deva Gijón"

title: (33117) Llanuces -
description: Beautiful place to spend the night. Very nice view of the mountain range. Horses and cows as a neighbor. Access is via a fairly steep path. We were able to mount it with a small motorhome.

title: (33191) Rañeces - Unnamed Road
description: Parking to visit the Meandros del Nora viewpoints. You can spend the night since there is no signage that prohibits it.

title: (33210) Gijón - 7 Calle Ramón Areces
description: Centro Municipal Integrado Pumarín Gijón Sur showers. Gijon indoor swimming pool

title: (33994) - Unnamed Road
description: Views of the reservoir and village of Tanes. We spent the night and only one car passed the next morning at about 11 o'clock. Great night with only the sound of the crickets and a cow roaring every little hehe. Recommended, on this same road there were two other sites before to stop but no views !!

title: (33310) Asturias - AS-255
description: Ample parking next to the church. Very quiet to spend the night. Next to it is the River Path of the Viacaba River.

title: (33209) Gijón - 6A Barrio Suco Urbano
description: Parking Ceares Cemetery. Very calm. Ideal to spend the night without noise. Far to walk to the center. Next to a well-kept park.

title: (33470) La Calabaza -
description: Large grassy esplanade next to a pretty little chapel. We spent the night there. Right very quiet with the added bonus of a beautiful view. We met only one person there who had come to feed the horses. No service (no water, no trash, no toilet). Thank you for respecting this beautiful place and for leaving no waste please

title: (33209) Gijón - 25 Camino Cementerio
description: Parking of the football stadium of los pericones or the cemetery just above. No problem to sleep on August 15, located in a large dog park 15 minutes walk from the city center. water points in the park and very clean toilets open during the day. Very quiet at night, there is even a shower (type beach shower) in the middle of the Park. Laundry in 5 minutes in Calle Ramon y Cajal.

title: (33117) El Molino - 22 AS-230
description: At the top of the cobertoria, quite flat gravel parking. Several hiking trails. Good place to see stage of the return or ascend by bicycle the gamoniteiro, the coverage and other nearby ports. On the roads that are next can also be accessed and parking, with some more slope in the terrain.

title: (33119) Asturias - 278 Lugar San Andres
description: Spring water, old drinking trough. Water quality is not guaranteed. However, it tastes good. Also saw locals taking water twice. Access and exit is good. Also possible with a large mobile. Faucet has no thread. The pipe is thick, so it is better to use a kettle or watering can to remove it. Weak water flow.

title: (33119) Priañes -
description: Parking area if the gazebo parking is full.

title: (33204) Gijón - 5 Camino Hermanos Canal Granda
description: Ample parking, very quiet, well lit with views of the Labor University of Gijón and surrounded by green areas. It is very well connected to visit the city by bus, taking the L1 that leaves you in the center. You also have a Mercadona 10 minutes walk away.

title: (33538) Infiesto - 3 Lugar el Llanu
description: Quiet area next to the sanctuary of the Virgen de la Cueva, with a swimming pool and an area with tables and gardens. Very nice walk to the river.

title: (33994) - AS-117
description: Quiet place next to a tank. For a walk to the village of Tanes. Quiet and close to the road.

title: (33394) Gijón -
description: La Laboral-City of Culture car park. I don't know if it will be possible to spend the night but to come to visit it is great, very beautiful and you get there well. Plenty of parking.

name: Llagar Castañón
title: (33314) Llagar Castañón
description: Asturian cider press. They have an area for loading and unloading water. They do guided tours of natural cider production. There is a store of Asturian products. It's called the Castañón cider mill and be careful with the timetable. They open from 9:30 a.m. to 2:00 p.m. and from 3:30 p.m. to 7:00 p.m. Saturdays from 10:30 a.m. to 2:00 p.m. Outside of these hours it is not accessible and the turn to return is not comfortable, if not reverse.

title: (33204) Asturias - 7A Avenida de Albert Einstein
description: Huge parking lot to spend the night. Very spacious and no stops or parking restrictions. To visit the city you have about 10-15min by bike.

title: (33203) Cimadevilla - 261 Calle Luis Moya Blanco
description: University parking lot parking possible during school holidays. nearby bus

title: (33115) - AS-360
description: Hiking trail, highly recommended route "Gorges" with spectacular views.

name: Area Recreativa Las Xanas
title: (33115) Area Recreativa Las Xanas
description: Recreational area parking to do the Xanas route.

title: (33204) Gijón - 302A Barrio Castiello Urbano
description: A Great calm and surveiled park near the sports center Las Mestas, much quieter for overnight than other parks I saw in Gijon, although to visit the city it is a little bit far from the center. In August with the city parks all full, this was perfect!

title: (33211) Gijón - 5A Calle de Orán
description: Masymas supermarket car park with free sewage emptying service and water refill. You can take advantage of making the purchase, leaving the recharging site free in case another camper wishes to use the services. Large parking lot open during supermarket hours.

title: (33211) Gijón - 106A Calle laminacion
description: Repsol with free water and air service. The pressure is ok.

title: (33629) Tiós - 46 Lugar Tios
description: Campa at the entrance of the town. Very good to spend the night. We ask permission because it is a public area and they did not put us any problem.

title: (33117) Asturias - 141A Lugar Llanuces
description: Viewpoint with parking in the middle of the road next to a small meadow that is months old and has impressive views. Almost no cars passed during the night. It has enough space for several vehicles, although we were completely alone. It has no source or garbage. It's fine to spend a night or stop to eat if you're on the way.

title: (33629) Tiós - LN-6
description: But we had a very quiet night. 4G and perfect DTT reception

title: (33530) Infiesto - 3 Plaza la Benéfica

The side spaces overlook a lawn so that you can park properly. 10 minutes walk from the center. We slept with no problems. No services. Very central

title: (33207) Gijón - 4 Calle Carlos Marx
description: Push&Clean laundry

description: Nice parking high in the mountains. Very very quiet. Further up the road you enter the mountains. Many km of beautiful walking among high peaks. Amazing views from the ermita. There is a picnic area with barbecue. The village below has spring water and municipal bins.  Access is very steep so powerful vans only.

title: (33207) Gijón - 82 Avenida Portugal
description: Parking in the city center. Very spacious, sites of interest.

title: (33530) Infiesto - 13 Calle San Miguel
description: New automatic laundry at 300m, next to a large food ..

title: (33115) Villanueva - 9 Barrio el Puente
description:
Nice fresh water fountain.
If you pass through here and you are hot, this fountain comes out of a very good cool water

title: (33213) Gijón - 428A Calle de Solar
description: Parking day and night, there are usually vans and motorhomes. dead end, on the other side is the railway
